mean_cn: n. 拆除（等于demolishment），破坏，毁坏
mean_en: deliberate destruction of a building or other structure
word_etyma: demoli毁坏 + tion名词后缀 → demolition 毁坏
sentence: He implements the demolition of the school buildings by blasting.
sentence_trans: 他以爆破的方式拆除了学校。
sentence_phrase: the demolition of the school buildings
